item.title: AirPort Base Stations: Will Apple Ever Return to Wi-Fi Router Market?
item.description: Throughout the 2000s and 2010s, Apple offered a line of Wi-Fi routers that it referred to as AirPort base stations. There was a standard AirPort Express, a higher-end AirPort Extreme with more advance
